execution_plan.description: Retrieve order_item_id with its associated shipment_date from the shipments database by joining shipment_items and shipments.
execution_plan.query: SELECT si.order_item_id, s.shipment_date FROM shipment_items si JOIN shipments s ON si.shipment_id = s.shipment_id;

execution_plan.description: Get product_id for each order_item_id returned by step 1 from the Orders database.
execution_plan.query: SELECT order_item_id, product_id FROM Order_Items WHERE order_item_id IN ($step1.order_item_id);

execution_plan.description: Retrieve product names for the product_ids obtained in step 2 from the Products database.
execution_plan.query: SELECT product_id, product_name FROM Products WHERE product_id IN ($step2.product_id);
